title: "You have to be level 7 to create a discussion"
body:
*TITLE* <-- is the msg i get when i try to  make a post with my main account ... it's already 30level for months now , yet  i can't make a post  ...
some help?

replies.body: Every now and then someone's board's account needs a little push to make sure it updates correctly with your Summoner level. Looks like this post must have done the trick since I can see you as level 30 now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K7md95yp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-20T21:25:25.905+0000)
>
> Every now and then someone's board's account needs a little push to make sure it updates correctly with your Summoner level. Looks like this post must have done the trick since I can see you as level 30 now!

eh.. i am talking about my main account .. i don't use this anymore  , i only make posts on the boards with this one  because  i doesn't allow me with the other   because i have to be level 7 lulz and i am already 30
Oh, well I'll need to know the Summoner name of that account otherwise I can't check it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K7md95yp,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-21T21:27:19.199+0000)
>
> Oh, well I'll need to know the Summoner name of that account otherwise I can't check it!

i main teemo 420 <--
Give it a try now and let me know!
